author: Kellet Reams
comment: I recorded te doorbell sound and tried to turn on vibration. But it didn't vibrate. Yes, I did go to advanced setting to turn it on. Nothing. Help me.
title: Vibration  not on

author: Cliff Docherty
comment: I don't always feel it vibrate.  Making the led flash when the doorbell goes would be a godsend.
title: Good app but...

author: emmanuel fernandez
comment: A little sad no Android wear support just pebble watch

author: Christopher Lindsey
comment: This looks great for my hearing-impaired relatives, but they have multiple doorbells with different sounds (one for front, one for back).  The app only supports one doorbell sound, so they can only be notified for one door.

reply.author: Anwar Almojarkesh
reply.content: Thank you Christopher for your feedback , This is just BEAT version with Limited feature , we will launch our new version very soon which can support huge range of sounds .

title: Cool idea, needs more granulairity

author: Vickie Finley
comment: This is really great it helps me alot!!

author: John Smith
comment: Very accurate even when the sounds so far from the device ,That will help deaf and hard of hearing a lot , I'm using it everyday to be alerted to my front doorbell , i like the concept very much!  I'm wondering if there is Apple version?

reply.author: Anwar Almojarkesh
reply.content:
Hello John,

Thank you for your review , You're welcome to send us any feedback about Braci App , please send  into info@braci.co .
About iOS version its ready to use , you can send us your UDID number of your iOS device ti be able to download Braci App into your device , Thanks

title: Fantastic App!

author: Neel Savla
comment: Guys i tried connecting it with a LG smart watch. It did sync all the other apps except for this one.  Did the restart, Factory Reset because we thought it was the issue with smart watch but it still didn't connect. Hope u can help us with this information further. Also let me know with which smart watch does this app works THE BEST. Thank you Anwar
title: Not Working

author: Jamie Eyrich
comment: Not Even Worth To Get This!!!! I even email to owner and not big help at all

reply.author: Anwar Almojarkesh
reply.content: Thank you Jamie for your feedback , We've checked with your phone model its old , that means the process of sound detection very slow.

title: It Goes Off Every 3 hours that has false Alarms

author: Fred K
comment: If it's working on Samsung Gear too that will be great not everyone have Pebble and also not everyone have Gear ... just give us a choice ....

reply.author: Anwar Almojarkesh
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback , We are working to make our app compatible with SAMSUNG gear

title: Only for pebble
